reviewtext: Bought a new DSLR camera, so of course needed a lens and screen cleaner. I was sold this exact Sima lens pen, it worked so well on all the cameras I decided to try it on my glasses. Boy was I amazed, I did'nt believe how clean and sharp my glasses became after using lens pen on my glasses. I was so amazed I purchased another Sima lens pen from amazon.com just for my glasses and I carry it with me whenever I leave home. I touched the tip and it left a black mark on my hand, whatever it is, it works. I highly recommend the Sima lens pen cleaning tool. I'll probably purchase 1 or 2 more of these, if you need this type of product, purchase this one it works greatly.
summary: This thing works better than expected.
